name: 探灵笔记X嗜血印·联动角色小鲤-线绣牡丹心衣
detailed_description:
"Chaos begets resentment, and vegetarian carp helps Ming Dynasty."
"Spiritual Notes" linked with "Bloodthirst Seal", the role of small carp into the Spiritual Investigation Authority.
GKD Game Studio X Yilong Studio
——————
This costume is a small carp-thread embroidered peony heart dress ornament, which can be seen and worn in the fitting room of "Tangling Notes" after unlocking.
[Linkage Costume] Little Cyprinus carpio embroidered peony heartwear
(Warning: When you relay game content to a third party, please choose the dress carefully!)
_and dream curtain flying in, peony silent is Yingying.
_This costume is a combination of "Notes on Spiritual Exploration" and "Bloodthirst" for skin
_Heart clothing is the close-fitting clothing of ancient women, which is necessary for daily life. Hand-made needles and threads are often decorated with embroidery patterns to express blessings, reflecting the unique artistic attainments and rich imagination of ancient Chinese women in the creation of ready-made clothes.
Peony is known as the "King of Flowers". Embroidery and heartwear symbolize beauty, brightness and happiness to embody auspiciousness and wealth.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1,Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 / AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 1GB或AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1,Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 GB available space

legal_notice:
